code: import _toConsumableArray from"@babel/runtime/helpers/toConsumableArray";import{ADD_TO_CART,REMOVE_FROM_CART,CLEAR_CART}from"../constants";var cartItems=function cartItems(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_TO_CART:return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[action.payload]);case REMOVE_FROM_CART:return state.filter(function(cartItem){return cartItem!==action.payload;});case CLEAR_CART:return state=[];}return state;};export default cartItems;
